overview.description: The file processing failed, and the content could not be retrieved. This page is expected to provide a guide on leveraging Nomic Atlas for building image classification models, including steps for data preparation, model training, embedding generation, and visualization.

sections.title: Introduction to Image Classification with Atlas
sections.details: Overview of how Nomic Atlas can be used to build and analyze image classifiers.

sections.title: Data Preparation
sections.details: Steps for preparing image datasets, including labeling, formatting, and metadata integration.

sections.title: Training Image Classification Models
sections.details: Guidelines for training neural networks for image classification tasks, potentially using libraries like PyTorch or TensorFlow.

sections.title: Generating Embeddings
sections.details: Instructions for generating embeddings from trained models and uploading them to Nomic Atlas for visualization.

sections.title: Visualizing Image Embeddings
sections.details: How to use Nomic Atlas to explore and analyze image embeddings, identify cluster overlaps, and debug model performance.
